tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE inventory_levels (
    item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name TEXT,
    current_quantity INT,
    min_threshold INT,
    max_threshold INT
)

CREATE TABLE alerts (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    item_id UUID,
    alert_type VARCHAR(50),
    alert_message TEXT,
    alert_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE FoodItems (
    item_id INT,
    item_name VARCHAR(255),
    quantity INT,
    location VARCHAR(50),
    expiration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE FridgeInventory (
    fridge_id INT,
    item_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    last_refill_date DATE,
    alert_threshold INT
);

CREATE TABLE FridgeHistory (
    event_id INT,
    fridge_id INT,
    event_type VARCHAR(50),
    event_date DATETIME,
    event_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ReplenishmentLogs (
    log_id INT,
    item_id INT,
    quantity_refilled INT,
    refill_date DATE,
    operator_name VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE Alerts (
    alert_id INT,
    item_id INT,
    alert_type VARCHAR(50),
    alert_date DATETIME,
    alert_message TEXT
);
